description.en: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.ar: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.br: Evita a perda de Exp. através da morte. (Evita a perda de 10% EXP para usuários com Karma)
description.cns: 使用后马上变为祝福状态，死亡后不会失去经验值。 (防止有罪恶值的用户失去10%经验)
description.de: Du bist so lange gesegnet, bis du stirbst und verlierst dann keine EXP.
description.fi: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.fil: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.fr: Parchemin bénissant le personnage pour qu'il ressuscite au Cristal de vie sans pénalité d'expérience - s'active par un double clic puis agit automatiquement à la mort du personnage (attention : un joueur PK rouge perdra de l'expérience !)
description.id: Mencegah hilangnya Exp melalui kematian. (Mencegah hilangnya 10% Exp untuk pengguna dengan Karma)
description.it: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.jp: 死亡しても経験値が減らない祝福が施された巻物(1回・カオスユーザの場合は経験値の10％のみ復旧されます）
description.kr: 사용 후 사망하는 경우 경험치 페널티가 면제됩니다. 캐릭터가 사망할 때까지 지속됩니다.(카르마가 있는 유저 사용 시 경험치 10% 복구)
description.nl: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.pl: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.ru: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.sp: Evita la pérdida de Exp por muerte. (Evita la pérdida del 10% de Exp de los usuarios con Karma)
description.sw: Prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.th: ป้องกันการสูญเสีย Exp จากการตาย (ป้องกันการสูญเสีย 10% Exp สำหรับผู้ใช้ Karma)
description.tw: 使用後馬上變為祝福狀態，祝福狀態時死亡不會失去經驗值，祝福狀態可以維持到角色死亡。(紅人狀態下死亡，將會保留原本死亡後所喪失經驗值之10%)
description.vi: Ngăn mất Exp khi chết. (Ngăn mất 10% Exp cho người dùng có Karma)
